content.question: What does the author suggest about interpersonal communication skills?

choices.label: They are weakened by online gaming.
They are improving among young people.
They are becoming more similar in different countries.
They are tied closely to academic achievement.

content.answer: They are weakened by online gaming.

unit.text: 4: How Science and Technology Affect Our Lives

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Interpret the meanings of a text.
